data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 188 believers in Çanakkale that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Çanakkale, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Çanakkale, Turkey to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Çanakkale, Turkey.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Çanakkale.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Çanakkale against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 188 believers in the state of Çanakkale with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 499,300 who are far from you in Çanakkale, Turkey from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Çanakkale
location.people_groups_list: Kurd, Kurmanji, Arab, North Iraqi, Alawite, Adyghe, Hemshin
